frame.name: Negative_conditional
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Anti_consequence</fen> is presented as not occurring if the <fen>Profiled_possibility</fen> occurs.
<ex><t>Unless</t> <fex name="Profiled_possibility">we try harder</fex> , <fex name="Anti_consequence">we 're gonna lose an opportunity here</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Profiled_possibility
FE.definition: <def-root>The situation presented explicitly as a possibility, contrasting with the implicit Negated_possibility.</def-root>

FE.name: Anti_consequence
FE.definition: <def-root>The situation that follows as a result of the Negated_possibility, and is not expected to occur if the <fen>Profiled_possibility</fen> holds.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: unless.scon
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of a possible situation) occurring if (a possibility) does not occur.

lexUnit.name: otherwise.adv
lexUnit.definition: FN: if the previously mentioned event does not occur or had not occurred.
